text:
="preserve">Yusop Jikiri (1951 – 17 October 2020) was a Filipino politician. He was a Leader within the Moro National Liberation Front (MNLF). From 2001 to 2004, he was Governor of Sulu Province in the Autonomous Region in Muslim Mindanao (ARMM). He also was a representative from Sulu's 1st District (2007–10) and ran again in 2010, but lost to Tupay Loong.
Jikiri died on 17 October 2020 at the age of 66.
